CustomField.formula: IF((TEXT(Project_Manager_CrownCastle__c) == "Katie Lillie"),"Katie.Lillie@crowncastle.com", IF((TEXT(Project_Manager_CrownCastle__c) == "Lisandra Fernandez"),"Lisandra.Fernandez@crowncastle.com", IF((TEXT(Project_Manager_CrownCastle__c) == "Kayleigh Fortuna"),"Kayleigh.Fortuna@crowncastle.com", IF((TEXT(Project_Manager_CrownCastle__c) == "Cassandra Zwick"),"Cassandra.Zwick@crowncastle.com", IF((TEXT(Project_Manager_CrownCastle__c) == "Stephanie Naida"),"Stephanie.Naida@crowncastle.com", IF((TEXT(Project_Manager_CrownCastle__c) == "Juanita Timney"),"Juanita.Timney@crowncastle.com", IF((TEXT(Project_Manager_CrownCastle__c) == "Gina Carroll"),"Gina.Carroll@crowncastle.com", IF((TEXT(Project_Manager_CrownCastle__c) == "Lisa Gebhart"),"Lisa.Gebhart@crowncastle.com", IF((TEXT(Project_Manager_CrownCastle__c) == "Oswin Chackochan"),"Oswin.Chackochan@crowncastle.com"," ")))))))))
